text: Did you know that on May 13th, 1985 Philadelphia police dropped a bomb on the home of members of the black liberation group MOVE, killing 11 of the 13 who resided inside of the home. Five of those victims were CHILDREN. 61 homes around the area were destroyed. #BlackLivesMatter

Philadelphia PD placing baton in a black man's hand to have an excuse to brutalize him. 

#PoliceBrutality #protest2020 #DictatorTrump #AmericaOrTrump #BlackLivesMatter https://t.co/UKIuQk3cYG
